reviews.comments: El departamento de Angeles es perfecto: ubicación inmejorable, decoración refinada y equipamiento más funcional hacen una fórmula perfecta para pasar una temporada perfecta en el corazón de la movida palermitana. Lo recomiendo con toda confianza!

Mi experiencia en el departamento de Angeles fue excelente. El departamento es hermoso, moderno, con todo lo necesario para una óptima estadía. Está muy bien ubicado, dentro del área de Palermo Hollywood, pero lejos del ruido. Los horarios de ingreso y salida, y la coordinación con la persona que acondiciona el dpto fue excelente. La predisposición de Angeles, y la comunicación fue siempre excelente. Todo sin inconvenientes y muy recomendable. Gracias

El departamento es muy lindo, alegre y luminoso, cómodo y muy bien ubicado. 
La cama es pequeña pero cómoda. Las almohadas deberían mejorar. 
Lo recomiendo!
Muy buena experiencia!

Tuvimos una estadia muy agradable, el apartamento esta muy bien situado, el barrio es lindo, no hay mucho ruido y el apartamento esta en muy buenas condiciones. Grate experience,  nice place and lovely neighborhood!

I stayed in this gorgeous apartment for 5 weeks - I needed to be in Palermo Hollywood, so the location was perfect for me. I'm a painter and the light and space were inspiring... I made five new paintings there! The views are wonderful and it's great to sit on the balcony in the sun - I had a perfect sight of the September 2015 lunar eclipse (the red moon!). The building is super secure and quiet (the security men on the desk are helpful and open the door for you when you return late at night, as I do because I'm a tango dancer), and the apartment is like a home, comfortable and welcoming and exactly as in the photos on Airbnb. Angie and her team in Buenos Aires looked after me so well, everyone was kind and accommodating, I was able to extend my stay by a few days easily and I was so grateful for that. I was there in some unusually cold weather, but the heating is easy and reliable, and the apartment was cosy and warm. The laundry in the basement was always available when I wanted it (you need coins of $1 and $2 pesos to use it which is normal in Buenos Aires apartment buildings, so save your change!). Decata (cafe on the corner) is fab for breakfast (or any meal) and has a great roof terrace. It's easy to walk to Ministro Carranza Subte or to the calle Niceto Vega for the bus to the centre. There are Carrefour and Dia mini-markets within a couple of blocks, and a great co-operative organic food market in the calle Bonpland. I enjoyed a very happy and peaceful 5 weeks in this apartment and I would recommend it to anyone! Thank you Angie. I will always have very fond memories of your lovely home and your kindness to me. Gracias! :)

The apartment was very comfortable and clean. The kitchen could use a few more items such as a spatula, newer pots and pans,  coffee cups and microwave. The location was very nice and surprisingly quiet. I was never bored living in  Palermo Hollywood as there is plenty to do and near enough to the train station to venture out to different parts of the city. The view was very nice and welcoming each morning I woke up.
The stay was fine.

We had a wonderful stay with Angeles. The department was as described in the listing and in a great location (close to bars, cafes and a short walk to public transport). Checkin and communication was easy.

Angeles' place is in the chic and walkable Palermo neighborhood of BA. It is a cute, clean, space with a nice view; we enjoyed coming home to it every night after a full day of exploring. Angeles was very responsive when we had one minor shower malfunction; it was promptly fixed. Check-in was clear and easy, the wifi is good, a list of helpful dining recommendations are included, and clear and reasonable expectations of  guests were outlined. I would definitely recommend staying in this lovely place while in Buenos Aires. FFor the price, it can't be beat!

I had a wonderful five day stay at Angeles apartment! She was a wonderful host!

The apartment come as advertised and is  great location. Walking distance to some of the best restaurants, bars and shopping in the city.

I would love to stay again at Angeles place!

Recomendo muito o apartamento de Angeles. Confortável, vista incrível da cidade, ótimo wi-fi. Excelente ter um cartão SUBE disponível para os hóspedes, pois não são muitos os lugares onde se pode obter um. O apartamento é muito bem localizado, tanto para caminhadas como relativamente próximo ao metrô e linhas de ônibus. Bons cafés e restaurantes próximos.
Beautiful apartment, great location, excellent service. Angeles was a great host. 10/10 overall, can't complain.

Fiquei 9 dias no apartamento da Angeles com o meu namorado e foi maravilhoso! A localização é ótima, próxima a vários cafés, restaurantes e bares. Há também mercado e kioskos 24h de fácil acesso. O apartamento é lindo, bem limpo e tudo funciona perfeitamente. É bem silencioso a noite e tem guardas noturnos na rua. Devido à disponibilidade, a Angeles antecipou nosso check-in e sempre esteve em contato conosco. Fomos recebidos pela Sol, que foi muito simpática e solícita. Obrigada pela estadia!

Passei 10 dias no apartamento da Angeles com uma amiga e foi uma experiência incrível! O apartamento é lindo e super bem decorado, além de ter uma vista maravilhosa. Alguns dias, inclusive, optamos por não sair para desfrutar do apartamento. A vizinhança é super tranquila é com muitas opções de bares e restaurantes com preços justos. A rua é bem tranquila e o bairro bem familiar, mas com opções de casas noturnas e bares.
A moça que nos entregou as chaves, Sol, foi muito simpática e ambas foram super compreensivas em relação ao atraso do nosso voo. O prédio tem segurança 24h, assim como a rua que tem guardas noturnos.
Reservaria este apartamento novamente sem pensar duas vezes!
Appartement très propre, dans un quartier agréable et calme ! Des cafés, des bars et des restaurants à proximité. On recommande

The apartment is in a secure building in a beautiful part of town. It lacked a coffee maker! An iron would have also been a nice touch. This is purely a stylistic matter, but I found the windows in the kitchen made it more difficult to use (the cupboards above the windows were dark). Still, overall, a cool place. Thanks!
Excelente apartamento, a 50m de PUBs, bares e restaurantes e ao mesmo tempo muito tranquilo, próximo a supermercados e cafeterias.
Great location, and great place.
This apartment is in a nice area of Palermo and has several bars, shops and restaurants within walking distance.  We really enjoyed our stay.

Great apartment in Palermo. It is well decorated and it is super clean. Also it is close to very good restaurants and cafes. Angeles is a great host. Her indications were clear and she always answered my questions quickly.

This is a great apartment and Angeles was an excellent host. It is a light, airy apartment in the middle of a fantastic neighborhood for visitors to Buenos Aires. This part of Palermo has some great cafes, restaurants and bars and is very lively. The apartment however is on a quiet block so it is not noisy. Great places to go nearby, always easy to find a cab. Overall a great place to stay if you are visiting Buenos Aires.

The location and property exceeded our expectations. Angeles was responsive to our questions both prior to and during our trip.  Laura, who tends to things for Angeles was lovely and got us quickly aquainted with the flat upon our arrival.  
The location allowed us to explore the local culture of Buenos Aires with quick and easy transportation to different neighborhoods.  It was eclectic and vibrant!  Highly recommend staying in Palermo and at this property!!!
Localização excelente. Apartamento próximo aos melhores restaurantes da (URL HIDDEN) essa localização é possível aproveitar muito lazer da cidade sem precisar de táxi, uber, metro, ônibus. Recomendo!

Such a cool space and in a fantastic part of Buenos Aires (Palermo). If you like daylight, then this spot is for you. It has incredible light and a nice patio to enjoy the outside. The internet worked great and the space was comfortable. I have some suggestions for the host to make the stay better, but overall, a very good spot in BsAs.

Angeles made us feel very welcome. She was very responsive and things went smoothly. We really loved the building, neighborhood and apartment and felt at home there. Would definitely stay again, thank you Angeles!

Palermo is a great neighborhood and the apartment was so lovely, near everything, 24 hr guard who lets you in/out when you arrive. Super easy to walk to great restos/bars/galleries. Lovely balcony and clean/cute depto.

Apartamento limpo, internet boa, bem localizado, umas 5 quadras do metrô, seguro, banho quente, cama normal, ar condicionado, bastante barulho de carro, bem iluminado e não fica totalmente escuro a noite o quarto para dormir.

Mooi appartement, prachtig uitzicht, gemakkelijke verplaatsing naar de ganse stad. Een aanrader!
Als we dan toch iets negatiefs moeten vermelden, is dat het zwembad in verbouwing was op het moment dat we hat appartement huurden. Het gebruik van het zwembad zou een extra dimensie gegeven hebben aan ons verblijf!  Spijtig, maar dit was geen noodzaak om van het verblijf te kunnen genieten.
Great stay in Buenos Aires! The apartment was just right for us. Great neighborhood. Easy walking to most places and easy to get a cab anywhere else. We would stay again and recommend to others.
Stayed one night in Angeles apartment, great place in a fantastic part of BA..... I just wish I could stay for longer. Check-in/out very straight forward. Highly recommended.
The host canceled this reservation 37 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The host canceled this reservation 45 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The host canceled this reservation 30 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Spent two weeks staying in Angie's Apartment while on holiday. Amazing apartment, amazing neighborhood. Could not have asked for anything more!
Great apartment, great location
Everything was amazing! Angeles was so helpful, location was perfect and the apartment was exactly as it looks in the photos. Highly reccomend!

The apartment is in a great location in Palermo Hollywood. Very near restaurants and next to a great cafe, but on a quiet street. Angeles is a easy to communicate with through the Airbnb app, though she couldn't meet us in person (as she notes in her profile, she spends a good deal of time abroad), She did send someone to greet us on her behalf. Unfortunately, the contact didn't speak English and my Spanish is limited. Therefore the tour of the apartment was basic and left us with questions later on. I was there with a friend and we planned for one of us to sleep in the bedroom and the other on the daybed. Both the bed and daybed are relatively small (as the photos show), but do know this if you're someone who needs a big bed. Given the temperatures in BA the weekend we stayed in the apartment, the fact that both rooms had AC units was a big plus--as were the 24-hour doorman and onsite laundry.

Flott leilighet, moderne ren og velholdt i hyggelig nabolag.
Vakt i inngangen.  Stor trygghet.
Trivelig nabolag, flott frokostkafe 50 meter unna.

Ble møtt av hyggelig dame som so for det praktiske. 

God valuta for pengene

Angeles' place was absolutely fantastic. It is in an amazing area in Palmero Hollywood, walking distance to all the shops, bars, restaurants, clubs you could ever want. 

Her apartment was extremely comfortable and clean with an amazing decor and building that made you feel truly comfortable. 

Angeles was also extremely helpful with all of my many questions about the area and always responded very quickly. She was amazing! 

If I ever come back to BA, I would love to stay in her place again. 

Thank you, Angeles!

Angeles was not able to receive us personally but she communicated with us through the whole duration and her friend, Cristina, was always readily available to help. You will fall in love with the apartment and location immediately; floor to ceiling windows throughout, keenly decorated, simply beautiful! As mentioned, you are in close proximity to everything you could need from parillas to heladorias. Everything was absolutely wonderful!
The apartment is exactly like the listing.  The location is great and the host was easy to contact and communicate with.  Very trustworthy place.

Rundum gemütlich!
Wir haben 9 Tage in der kleinen, feinen Wohnung mit toller Aussicht und in guter Lage verbracht. Die Vermieterin haben wir nicht kennengelernt, dafür hat uns aber Cristina alles gezeigt, was wir brauchen. Es war alles so, wie beschrieben, sehr sauber und bequem. In der Nähe gibt es jede Menge guter Lokale, schicke kleine Läden und es ist sicher. Wir haben uns wohl gefühlt und kommen sicher wieder.
Had a quick stay in this nice apartment. Great looking wood floors, a very nice view, comfortable bed, and a reasonably nice neighborhood with shops and restaurants nearby.

tout c'est passé très correctement, propre et fonctionnel, l'appart es très agréable.
merci
Really nice and cozy apartment. A few really nice cafe just around the corner and 15 min walk to Pallermo Holywood.

I didn't actually meet Angeles but my correspondences with her and the woman, Maria, who helped me check in and out were prompt and helpful. The flat was as pictured and in a great part of Buenos Aires with lots of things to do nearby! The only downside was that laundry access was pretty difficult given that the machines in the building required 1 and 2 peso coins to work and small change like that is pretty hard to come by. Overall, I recommend staying here!

We had an amazing time at Angeles's apartment. Her assistant met us at the apartment to give us the keys and show us the amenities. SHe was very friendly and gave us a pamphlet on local things to do in the city. The apartment looks exactly like the pictures and the huge windows gave it a really awesome vibe. There is easy to adjust heat and ac and we both slept very well in the comfortable bed. There is plenty of room in the kitchen to do some cooking and it's absolutely lovely drinking wine on the balcony. The area is very safe and walking distance to cool bars and boutiques. I would highly recommend staying here!

Stayed a few days at this appartment and I loved my stay here. Location is excellent, just a few minutes (walking) away from the nice restaurants / bars / clubs in Palermo. Despite the appartment is still quiet so you'll have good sleep at night. Appartment has a nice & spacious livingroom with a well-equiped kitchen. Also loved sitting in the sun on the balcony with a cup of coffee. Bedroom & bathroom (en-suite) are nice & comfortable as well. Owner provides also a lot of information about the city & neighborhood which is really nice when it's your first time in Buenos Aires.

Just perfect! It exceeded our expectations!
Impeccably clean with tasteful decor and in super safe building with doorman. Location is great! Personally my favorite area in BA.
Angeles’ assistant Laura welcomed us in the apartment and both of them made sure we had a wonderful stay.
Thank you, guys!
